markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Artistic Flourish](/Spells.aspx?ID=1789)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 373 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Domain**
[Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=68)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 15 feet

**Target** 1 item or work of art that fits entirely within the range
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

You transform the target into a form that more closes matches your creative vision. It's clearly the same item, but with aesthetic details you choose. The target is a beautiful and impressive piece for its new quality, but the effect is obviously magical and temporary, so its monetary value doesn't change. If you're an expert in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4), the item grants a +1 item bonus to attack rolls if it's a weapon or skill checks if it's a skill tool. When you Cast this Spell, any previous casting ends.

---
**Heightened (7th)** If you're a master in Crafting, the item grants a +2 item bonus.

**Heightened (10th)** If you're legendary in Crafting, the item grants a +3 item bonus.
name: Artistic Flourish
